name: overmedicated
text: Pat! Pat! Pat!

name: tollschaft
text:
CALM
PAT
DOWN!

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: I love Dr. Andretti's response to Ray plucking out his pubes.

name: androo
text: And in the frame, the way Ray is looking curiously into the can.

name: lexsenthur
text: "Why wont this curly little bastard go IN?"

name: phat
text: It's a byproduct of being Ray's doctor for so long. You come to expect this kind of thing.

name: wonelove
text: a very montone "nasty."

name: berami
text: And quickly moving along to prevent Ray from trying to start a conversation about it.

name: ssddr
text: Ray always finds the best way to utilize his downtime.

name: agika
text: Apparently suckling a 6 pound hornet makes one an asshole.  Is this a glimpse into Pat's past?

name: luckypyjamas
text: or foreshadowing into the future...

name: tinkerbell_9
text:
Remember that "suckling a hornet" means that the hornet was feeding from Pat's engorged mammaries, not the other way round.

And, somehow, that's worse...

name: chaesar
text: That's about the best thing you're ever gonna find in a Pepsi can.

name: theoneyouwant
text: take THAT pepsi-cola bottling co.!

name: tellumo
text: A comment left by tellumo was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Connellingus, hooraybacon, Zem)

name: invidious
text:
Don't you mean CAN of pain?

Forgive me.

name: not_onstad
text: HUGE slam on Pepsico out of nowhere!

name: raging_cow
text: Come on! Nonstad. NONSTAD. IT WAS SO PERFECT FOR LIVING.

name: centipede_damascus
text: When Ray gets bored, he does nasty things.

name: ford
text:
When i'm bored i do nasty things.

Well, just the one nasty thing, really.

name: rapid_roy
text: Alt text: The Prick Is Back In Town

name: allanpinkerton
text:
When I read that alt-text my mind automatically started playing the song "The Boys Are Back In Town", but "boys are" was replaced with "prick is".

"The prick is back in taaah-ah-ah-aaaown!"

Good times.

name: benhead
text:
Guess who just got back today?
That motherfuckin' prick who'd been away.
Defibrilated, hasn't much to say,
'Cept "shuffle your shit-makin' ass outta here!"
Nobody missed him when he was gone,
Some guy was in his skin writin' happy folk songs,
But some hornet-suckling's got him feeling all wrong,
So he's just gonna tell you to shove it!
The prick is back in town!
(The prick is back in town!)
The prick is back in towowwowown!

(The great thing about making alternate lyrics to that particular song is you can be REALLY loose about syllable count.)

name: tinhand
text:
That second panel is genius. The questions it raises. Why has Ray decided on plucking out his pubics as a form of entertainment, and why did he have to tell Dr Andretti about it?
This comic gets a 5 just for that panel. I actually LOLed.

name: gompo
text: The other thing about it is that he keeps the can with him throughout the entire comic.  He even brings it to Pat's bedside.  I would almost think he was planning to have Pat drink from it but that doesnt really seem like Ray's style.

name: evolume
text: He's trying to be as much (or more) 'a player as the honorable Clarance Thomas I'd wager.

name: paperboy_2000
text:
Can we put some heat under this sucker?

What is your location?

Department of Education legal offices

Is there a soda can available?

Yes -> Put pubic hair in soda can

Feign surprise and show the soda can to your legal assistants

Anita Hill is hella laughing

name: heyman
text: yeah man. Yeah man

name: charchar
text: nice comment/avatar whammy

name: scrumpton
text: I think the more pressing question is why a cat is plucking his pubes. Does he just want a big bald patch in the middle of his fur? Probably a good way to call attention to his junk though.

name: nathanielperson
text: That's an old-school Pepsi can Ray's stashing his pubes in.

name: professorhazard
text: The Underground is probably full of ancient Pepsi machines, such as the type you find at extremely rural gas stations.

name: tekende
text: Or hotels in certain parts of Florida.

name: dasilodavi
text: So this is my third time through the archives, and at this moment Pepsi has yet again re-done their image to capitalize on the idea of "change" that current president Barack Obama has brought about in the nation.  I wonder what fun full-circle changes will be around when I come 'round these parts again?

name: dtuba
text: or a simple rural airport

name: hendetta
text: Dr. Andretti always comments on but never makes a fuss on how Ray ain't nobody's picnic.

name: alphagator
text: ...but how did the concert go?

name: dasilodavi
text: That IS what the ass does...

name: hellofyellin
text: And Pat is revived a la the Flintstonian method.  All is right with the world.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Defibrilators are Flintstonian?

name: yingkaixing
text: Repetition of whatever physical act caused the psychological trauma is the preferred method of reversal in cartoons and comics.

name: hellofyellin
text: Precisely.  Martini?

name: stuart
text: The "SHB method"

name: pyro_ike
text: And so, all is right with the world again.

name: mr_lostman28
text:
I've always imagined this strip ending with someone going
"That's our Pat"
"hahahahahha"
ba-da-bum.... BA!
Freeze frame... roll credits

name: erutangis
text: When we last saw Pat, he was playing "Day Tripper" and did not appear to be in need of any electric stabilization. Presumably Animalicious's musical acid trip was so rad, it made Pat heart attack.

name: wildcat
text: END.

name: shutup_shutup
text: For some reason, it always slays me when Ray thinks an italicized question like that in response to a surprising statement, as in A nearby town?

name: hbaranov
text: Pat is such a miserable creature. Onstad did me a great boon by making him gay, and thus unable (were he somehow to attract a female) to reproduce. This means when he dies, he shall be... no more.

name: miku224
text: Don't be so sure.  Death isn't exactly permanent round these parts.

name: tfaironpirate
text: Lol, this response to the person using Death from the Sandman as their avatar. I... think...

name: chester_fame
text:
Clarence Thomas v Anita Hill

Achewoods first Supreme Court Justice reference?

name: wonelove
text: Hey Pat, want some Pepsi?

name: johnnybaverage
text: That jacket really isn't doing Ray any favors.

name: vermy
text: How old is that pepsi can? It looks like one of the ones from circa 1987
